d:
We love our porn parodies. They're a classic joy when it comes to the adult world of film and how we get to see our favorite shows and movies take a turn in the script that make things a bit more steamy. Even if it made no sense and the acting was...less than desired.
So why not a Straight Shota porn parody series?

This became a favorite project of mine that I made two rules in order to make it both creative and a challenge.
1. The characters need to have actual interaction or plausible opportunities for interaction so there can be a scene of them engaging in NSFW
2. It cannot be based on an actual plot piece. As in if the movie/show/game has the characters engage in NSFW, even if likely off screen, then it is disqualified for a porn parody.

Got a movie/show/game that falls under these rules where a young boy and older woman characters share the screen or have a plausible means to interact? Feel free to drop suggestions in the comments!

Feel free to follow me on Pixiv to stay up to date with my content!
https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/109321674
